snippet: Jamie Murray will become Britain's first world number one professional tennis player since computerized rankings were introduced in the 1970s after the ATP World Tour confirmed on Sunday he will take top spot in doubles from Marcelo Melo....
lead_paragraph: Jamie Murray will become Britain's first world number one professional tennis player since computerized rankings were introduced in the 1970s after the ATP World Tour confirmed on Sunday he will take top spot in doubles from Marcelo Melo.

headline.print_headline: Jamie Murray Set for British First in Doubles Rankings
headline.main: Jamie Murray Set for British First in Doubles Rankings
